summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Dublin Study Phase 2 implementation - Admin panel, School dashboard, and role-based authentication. All core Phase 2 functionalities are working correctly including admin stats, school approval workflow, course creation restrictions, and role-based navigation.
passed_tests: All 34 backend API endpoints working correctly (Phase 2 expansion)
Admin login with admin@dublinstudy.com / admin123
Admin dashboard shows correct stats (users, schools, enrollments, revenue)
Admin can view all schools in Schools tab
Admin can approve/reject pending schools
Admin can view all users, enrollments, payments
School registration at /register-school creates pending school
School login redirects to /school dashboard
School dashboard shows stats and pending status alert
School cannot create courses when pending (button disabled)
School can create courses after admin approval (button enabled)
School can view their enrollments
Student registration still works at /register
Student login redirects to /dashboard
Role-based authentication and redirects working
Navbar shows appropriate links for all user roles
School approval workflow (pending -> approved)
Course creation dialog and form functionality
Email notifications are MOCKED and logged to backend console
All Phase 1 functionality still working (schools, courses, enrollment, payments)
